original_text: And the Lord said, Who shall entice Ahab king of Israel, that he may go up and fall at Ramothgilead? And one spake saying after this manner, and another saying after that manner.
korean_text: 여호와께서 말씀하시기를 누가 이스라엘 왕 아합을 꾀어 그에게 길르앗 라못에 올라가서 죽게 할까 하시니 하나는 이렇게 하겠다 하고 하나는 저렇게 하겠다 하였는데

sentences.original_text: Who shall entice Ahab king of Israel
And one spake saying after this manner
and another saying after that manner.
